ygData.subject: Re: 1hs vs 2hs
ygData.msgSnippet: (/ooc:  I have another character, Amantar a level 8 shadow knight.  I m using 1-H slash and I hit about 60% of the time on creatures that are less powerful
ygData.messageBody:
(/ooc: I have another character, Amantar a level 8 shadow knight. I'm
using 1-H slash and I hit about 60% of the time on creatures that are less
powerful than me. Azog's level 4 and uses 2-H slash and missed about 60%
of the time.

I agree that you should be missing a lot more as you progress.)

-----Original Message-----
From: erik lawrence antonsen [mailto:eantonse@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 5:19 PM
To: 'shadowknight@onelist.com'
Subject: [shadowknight] Re: 1hs vs 2hs


From: erik lawrence antonsen <eantonse@...>



Oogog level 8. @-H slash around (43?) Not sure, but close. I thought
that at level 8, I would miss less...not the case.

Oogog


On Thu, 22 Apr 1999, Chip O'Brien wrote:

> Ug! Wat leverl r u & wat typ of weapn r u usin? Is 2-h slash yer bezt
> bashin skill? Me notice, sometimez, dat der timez where me seem to mizz
> mor. Sometimez Azog mov hiz position (/ooc: backup several steps) & dat
> helpz. I tink yer problum may be cauzed by yer eggsperience & combat
skillz
> (/ooc: especially if you are at a lower level).
>
> Azog, Troll Shader Night
> Xegony Server
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: erik lawrence antonsen [mailto:eantonse@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 3:09 PM
> To: shadowknight@onelist.com
> Subject: [shadowknight] Re: 1hs vs 2hs
>
>
> From: erik lawrence antonsen <eantonse@...>
>
>
> I would like to know why I miss so much in battle. I was grouping last
> night and while everyone else (warriors and shamans) were hitting the bad
> guys, I had tons of misses. Is there some way that I can minimize it?
> Also, I use 2-H slash because I like to look of the 2 handed axes even
> though it is slower...
>
> Oogog
>
>
> On Thu, 22 Apr 1999, Grant Vanderhule wrote:
>
> > From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
> >
> > i also use 1hs weapons. i'm not sure about other's experience, but for
> some
> > reason my 1hs skill seems to raise much more rapidly than my 2hs skill.
> also
> > i prefer the speed of one hand weapons, because for some ungodly reason
my
> > hit rate is terrible, and the more chances to hit i get the more damage
i
> > do. the ability to bash is also useful. besides, if you have a polished
> > granite tomahawk, what use have you for a two hander? ;)
> >
